name: AI notice
description: A generic AI notice informing users about the use of AI.

properties.name: text
properties.values: This service uses AI to extract planning data from documents. This may produce inacurate results. Please check all outputs before use.

examples.title: Default
examples.template:
Important

This service uses AI to extract planning data from documents. This may produce inacurate results. Please check all outputs before use.

name: Copy text
description: Copy text component allows users to copy predefined text to their clipboard with a single click. It supports both styled and unstyled versions for flexible integration.

properties.name: copyContent
properties.values: This text is copied to clipboard when the button is clicked.

examples.title: Styled
examples.template:
<copy-text
  text="This text is copied to clipboard"
  label="Copy text to clipboard"
  feedback="Copied!"
  styled="true"
>
  Copy
</copy-text>

examples.title: Unstyled
examples.template:
<copy-text
  text="This text is copied to clipboard"
  label="Copy text to clipboard"
  feedback="Copied!"
  styled="false"
>
  Copy
</copy-text>

name: Filter: date
description: Formats a date string into a specified format.

name: Filter: docType
description: Returns a human-readable document type based on a given code.

name: Entity tasks
description: TODO Used after an extraction has been completed to show the user the tasks they need to complete to finalise their entity data.

name: Filter: entityTitle
description: Returns the singular or plural title for a given entity type. Also returns the entity id as well.

name: Example component
description: An example component that demonstrates how to write a documentation file for a component.

name: Extraction list
description: TODO Table showing a list of extractions the user has created.

name: Filter: filterBy
description: Filters a collection based on a specified key and value.

examples.title: Default
examples.template:
Alpha global feedbackHtml variable

Page title

This is the lede text for the hero component.

name: Loading Spinner
description: Loading spinner component shows a loading state while content is being fetched or processed in the background.

examples.title: Awaiting start
examples.template: Your PDF is being processed. This may take a few minutes. Please refresh the page to check the status.

examples.title: Completed
examples.template: Your PDF is being processed. This may take a few minutes. Please refresh the page to check the status.

examples.title: Failed
examples.template: Your PDF is being processed. This may take a few minutes. Please refresh the page to check the status.

examples.title: In progress
examples.template: Your PDF is being processed. This may take a few minutes. Please refresh the page to check the status.

name: Location Info
description: Location info component shows information about a specific location.

examples.title: Default
examples.template:
File name

TPO_38 _15-1.pdf

Copy
Address

Daintry Street, Oakhill, Stoke-on-Trent

Copy
X, Y (Easting, Northing)

386875, 343876

Copy
Latitude, Longitude

52.992052, -2.196986

Copy

name: PDF
description: PDF component shows an embedded PDF document within the page. Options to toggle visibility.

name: Simple map
description: Simple map component shows a simple map within the page. Options to toggle visibility.

examples.title: Default
examples.template:
<simple-map
    title="Default map example"
    zoom="14"
    lat="51.5074"
    lng="-0.1278"
    enableToggle="false"
  ></simple-map>

examples.title: Toggle map
examples.template:
<simple-map
    title="Default map example"
    zoom="14"
    lat="51.5074"
    lng="-0.1278"
    enableToggle="true"
  ></simple-map>

name: Filter: sourceFile
description: Converts localstack to localhost in a given URL string.

name: Status checker
description: Status checker component shows the status of a job or process.

examples.title: Govuk tag
examples.template: completed

examples.title: Plain text
examples.template: The current status is: awaiting_start

name: Title
description: Title component shows a title, caption and optional tag representing the current page data type tree, tree protection zone etc.

examples.title: Title caption tag
examples.template:
Tag text

This is a caption Name of a page

examples.title: Title caption
examples.template: This is a caption Name of a page
